title: Megathil Ondrai Nindrome Lyrics Kadhal Sadugudu
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Megathil Ondrai Nindrome Lyrics Kadhal Sadugudu

Megathil ondraai
nindrome anbe
mazhai neeraai sidhari
pogindrom anbe (2)

privenbathaal nenjile
baaram illai.
mazhai enbadhu
neerukku maranam illai.

meendum oru naal
megam aagi
vaanil serndhiduvom.
iruvar koodi
oru thuli aagi
muththaai maariduvom.

Megathil ondraai
nindrome anbe
mazhai neeraai sidhari
pogindrom anbe

kannai kavvum
un kangalai kadhalithen
karpai thodum un
paarvaiyai kadhalithen
asai konda un aanmaiyai
kadhalithen
meesai konda un
menmaiyai kathalithen.

nila vizhum un
vizhigalai kathalithen
nilam vizhum
un nizhalaiyum kadhalithen
netri thodum un
mudigalai kadhalithen
nenjai moodum
un udaigalai kathalithen.

kannaa silanaal pirivom
athanaal uravaa seththuvidum
kadal neer konjam
megam aanaal
kadalaa vattrividum

veliyoor pogum
kaatrum orunaal
veettukku thirumbi varum.
pirithal enbathu
ilaiyuthir kaalam
nichchiyam vasantham varum.

Megathil ondraai
nindrome anbe
mazhai neeraai sidhari
pogindrom anbe

anbae anbae unai
enganam pirinthiruppen
nilaa vandhaal
en iravugal erindhiruppen
unnai ennai
en uyir thalam udainthiruppen
kannaal kandaal
naan irumurai uyirtharippen.

anbe anbe unai
enganam marandhiruppen
nitham nitham un
kanavukkul idam pidippen
penne penne
nam pirinivil thunaiyiruppen
kanne kanne
en kangalai anuppi vaippen

iththanai pirivu
thagumaa endru
iyarkaiyai kandikkiren.

yaenthaan avarai kandaai
endru kangalai thandikkiren

piriyum podhum piriyam
valarum pirindhe santhippom
vazhkai enbathu vattachaalai
meendum sandhippom

Megathil ondraai
nindrome anbe
mazhai neeraai sidhari
pogindrom anbe

privenbathaal nenjile
baaram illai.
mazhai enbadhu
neerukku maranam illai.

meendum oru naal
megam aagi
vaanil serndhiduvom.
iruvar koodi
oru thuli aagi
muththaai maariduvom.
